item.title: US tells Denmark to 'calm down' over alleged Greenland influence operation
item.description: The aim was reportedly to infiltrate Greenland's society and promote its secession from Denmark.

item.title: Blair joins White House meeting with Trump on post-war Gaza
item.description: The talks come as Israel prepares to seize Gaza City as a step towards full control of the territory.

item.title: 'Exhausted, hungry, and scared': What it's like to be a journalist in Gaza
item.description: Palestinian journalists give the BBC first-hand accounts of the hardship and dangers they face while reporting on the war.

item.title: European leaders boost Moldova in face of 'relentless' Russia
item.description: France, Germany and Poland leaders travel to state to back EU accession plan weeks before key election.

item.title: Denmark apologises to Greenland's forced contraception victims
item.description: Mette Frederiksen says sorry to to women who were fitted with devices, sometimes without their knowledge.
